name: Fulton
description: Come celebrate National Running Day with us! Our longest running event in the Series, a happy hour style fun run + beer is a great way to enjoy a Tuesday evening! Click on the big red button for more info & to register.

name: Harriet Brewing
description: Live music, food trucks, and amazing Belgian ales & German lagers! Maybe a little hammerschlagen. Paired with a fun run, friends, and sunny day…this is what we like to call a Harriet Beer Run! AND…our run will kickoff Harriet's official High Summer Reggae Fest!!! Click on the big red button for more info & to register.

name: Third Street Brewhouse
description: Our first out state MN run, and what better place than in Cold Springs, MN, a town with a long history of brewing! Bound to be a great time — food, music, games & more. Stay for the party and celebrate Third Street’s Third anniversary from 2 to 8pm. Limited release beers, live music, BBQ, brewery tours, and more! Click on the big red button for more info & to register.

name: Bent Paddle
description: Hello Duluth! You could call the end of June a road-trip for us, as this will make back-to-back weekends of out state MN breweries. Take back a great beer, in this wonderful brewery that's mission is to bend the traditions. See you at The Bent Tap. Click on the big red button for more info & to register.

name: Lake Superior Brewing
description: A Duluth double-header! Fun run starts at 2pm at one of MN's oldest micro breweries! Click on the big red button for more info & to register.

name: The Lager Jogger Part 1
description: Join us at the Craft Bar & Lounge inside the Convention Center for the start of a fun run in Minneapolis, followed by a great craft brew! The Lager Jogger event is open to the community and sure to be a great time! Participants receive a beer & goodie bag included in registration. Registration Opening Soon!

name: Great Waters Brewing Co.
description: One of the more established brewery / brew pubs in town, GWBC has been brewing beer since before the internet. Located on a cozy street in Downtown St. Paul, the fun run course will weave through our great State's capital! A true St. Paul experience! Click on the big red button for more info & to register.

name: The Lager Jogger Part 2
description: Join us at the Craft Bar & Lounge inside the Convention Center for the start of a fun run in Minneapolis, followed by a great craft brew! The Lager Jogger event is open to the community and sure to be a great time! Participants receive a beer & goodie bag included in registration. Registration Opening Soon!

name: Boom Island
description: Part of Boom Days hosted at the brewery, join us for amazing — mostly Belgian style — beers, live music, food trucks and more festivities at the brewery than you can shake a stick at! Click on the big red button for more info & to register.

name: Bent Brewstillery
description: Did you say BREWSTILLERY? Yes, that's right — the best of both worlds. Beer & sprits come together with a nice fun run around the Brewery in Roseville. Live music will be kickin', there'll be patio games, a food truck, and more! Click on the big red button for more info & to register.

name: NE Runner Takeover
description: Join us for a once in a life time running experience that will include a start line dance party, a running course that literally goes through a brewery, and 'sliding' across the finish line. The post-run experience includes food trucks, 11 breweries, and live music! Also enjoy free pre-run warm-ups, a free beer, a collectors pint glass, and much more! Click on the big red button for more info & to register.

name: Nershfest 2015 Beer Run
description: Kicking off Nershfest 2015, join us for a fun beer run that starts & ends at Harriet Brewery! Each participant receives a free beer, early access into NershFest, a souvenir pint glass, chance to win prizes, a fun time & access to free samples from local vendors! Multiple bands lined up for the day - sure to be a GREAT time! A portion of all proceeds from the fun run will support the MN Music Coalition! Click on the big red button for more info & to register.

name: Brit's Pub Run
description: A fun run that starts & ends at Brit's Pub in downtown Minneapolis! Free Summit beer at the finish, and each runner receives a souvenir pint glass, free runners SWAG from Gear Running Store, and more! Live music by Wain McFarlane, chance to win one of many raffled prizes like Twins Tickets & gift cards, and tons of fun hanging out on the roof top patio at Brit's! Click on the big red button for more info & to register.

name: Day Block Brewing
description: Happy beer hour, part 2 of the year. Join us for our second of two weekday beer runs, hosted at this lovely brewpub in Downtown Minneapolis serving up beer, pizza's, bacon flights and more. Live music & great food! Click the big red button for more info & to register.

name: 612 Brew
description: One of our bigger events of the year, join us for a Brew-run-ery of a time. Live music on the expansive patio, along with yard games, food truck, and SIX in your hand after a nice run through Nordeast' = AWESOME! Click on the big red buton for more info & to register.

name: Fair State Brewing
description: Join us at the first brewery coop in the State as we fun-run through NE Minneapolis and enjoy a freshly brewed beer! So good, you might want to become a coop member! Click on the big red button for more info & to register.

name: Wander North Distillery
description: We thought about calling it a “Stripping Run” (phrase used in distilling meaning the first run through the distilling process), but we will stick with “SPIRIT RUN”! The first of it's kind: Run, then enjoy a Cocktail made from craft distilled vodka, gin, or run right here at Wander North! Click on the big red button for more info & to register.

name: Mankato Brewery
description: Join us in Mankato for a home-town feel fun run and great beer from Mankato Brewing. You are sure to enjoy this expansive brewery, fun, and music! Click on the big red button for more info & to register.

name: Summit Brewing
description: The place that put the Twin Cities on the map for craft brewing many years ago hosts us for this Labor Day weekend run-tacular fall event. Nothing like winding down the summer with a great run & a EPA, right? Click on the big red button for more info & to register.

name: Northgate
description: Our event in 2014 was the first ever held at Northgate's shinning new brewery & taproom, and we are back this year with what is sure to be a memorable time! A great tap room nestled in industrial part of NE, offers great beer (WALL'S END brown ale is a must) and a unique running route! Click on the big red button for more info & to register.

name: AFFILIATE EVENT - MN River Builders 5k
description: Our first ever affiliate event! We have teamed-up with the MN River Builders 5k event to draw awareness to other great run + beer events happening in MN! Brats, Brews from Mankato Brewery, and live music all part of the fun! Click on the big red button to register!

name: Sociable Cider Werks
description: Mmmmm…Apples…Colorful Leaves…and Sociable Cider Werks, just a few of our favorite Fall things in Minneapolis! THEE place for Hard Cider also offers beers. To celebrate, free apples from a local orchard will be given out, along with some apple-themed vendors onsite with products for sale! Click on the big red button for more info & to register.

name: Burning Brothers
address: 1750 Thomas Ave W, St Paul, MN 55104
description: Committed to being 100% gluten free, and 100% delicious…American Pale Ales, Coffee Ale, and IPAs and more! Our event will highlight the world of gluten free, be fun, and of course entail a great run! Click on the big red button for more info & to register.

name: Bad Weather Brewing
description: A storm is brewing on West 7th Street! The new location for the Brewery will be open just in time for a little run, a little beer, and a lot of fun! Click on the big red button for more info & to register.

name: Spooktacular Double Header AM
description: Have a beer-tacular Halloween with us! Costumes are a must, along with beer drinking & fun! Be really beer-o-ween and join us for a double-header down at Badger Hill in the afternoon! Click on the big red button for more info & to register.

name: Spooktacular Double Header PM
address: 4571 Valley Industrial Blvd S #500, Shakopee, MN 55379
description: Gold medal beer, new taproom, and same ole' beer-running fun in Shakopee! Part two of our DOUBLE-HEADER beer-tacular Halloween day events! Be beer-o-ween with us and join us at Fulton in the morning! Click on the big red button for more info & to register.

name: Dangerous Man
description: Thanksgiving is right around the corner…we're here to help you pre-burn some calories! We'll pretend the great Dangerous Man beer you get to drink afterwards doesn't count! What a way to relax before the in-laws arrive! Click on the big red button for more info & to register.

name: NE Winter Dash
description: Year two of this amazing event! Two breweries, the beer-five zone, and a 0.5k dash…all in one day! Two beers included, PLUS we promise a really cool seasonal merchandise item! Click on the big red button for more info & to register.

name: Lose Your Resolution Run
description: Is your new year's resolution to get fit and active? Perfect! After you do a fantastic job on the run…break your resolution! We will have BEER (of course) BACON, and ICE CREAM!! The brew pub also has food available for ordering! Click on the big red button for more info & to register.
